TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void OlkTimeControlEvents_ExitEventHandler(ref bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed OlkTimeControlEvents_ExitEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub OlkTimeControlEvents_ExitEventHandler(ByRef Cancel As Boolean)

Docs.param: False quando o evento ocorre. Se o procedimento de evento define este argumento como True, a operação de saída não será concluída e o foco permanecerá nesse controle.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
